meanings.sent1: The decision to jump off a moving swing was truly moronic.
meanings.sent2: It was moronic to try and fit a square peg into a round hole.
meanings.sent3: His moronic attempt to eat soup with a fork left everyone chuckling.
meanings.sent4: The moronic idea of using a ladder as a bridge ended in disaster.
meanings.sent5: The moronic behavior of wearing a winter coat in the summer was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of intelligence or common sense
meanings.sent1: The moronic mistake of wearing mismatched shoes was embarrassing.
meanings.sent2: It was moronic to believe that the moon was made of cheese.
meanings.sent3: Her moronic choice to wear sunglasses at night made her look silly.
meanings.sent4: The moronic decision to use a hairdryer in the bathtub was dangerous.
meanings.sent5: The moronic act of trying to pet a wild bear was a lesson in foolishness.
